resources.string: There are ten zeros in the number one million.
The square root of one hundred is five.
Ice is made out of glass.
The fifth planet away from the sun in the solar system is mars.
Fish sleep with their eyes closed.
If you mix all the colors of the rainbow together you get white.
Hawaii is part of the United States.
Twenty minus thirty plus ten equals zero.
If you are facing the right wall of your room and turn ninety degrees right, then one hundred eighty degrees right, and finally ninety degrees left you are facing the left wall of your room.
